---
title: "PySpark Example"
format: html
execute:
  echo: true
  warning: false
  error: false
---
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("example").getOrCreate()

# Example data
data = [
    ("Caroline", 32),
    ("Mike", 34),
    ("Ryan", 34),
    ("Katie", 32)
]
columns = ["Name", "Age"]

# Create DataFrame
df = spark.createDataFrame(data, columns)
df.show()
